descript.value: SQL text для запросов к БД чеков Кристалл

sql_get_sum.value: SET DATEFORMAT dmy; SELECT (round(sum(h.Summa), 2)) as SUMMA FROM [ChequeHead] h WITH (NOLOCK) where h.Cash_Code <> '' and convert(date, h.DateOperation) = ? and h.StatusFiscal <> 0 and h.Status <> 0 and ? is not null and h.shopindex = ?

sql_head_check.value: SET DATEFORMAT dmy; SELECT h.ID AS DOCIDCASH, convert(datetime, h.DateOperation) AS DOCDATE, CAST(CASE WHEN h.Operation= 'P' THEN 'SALE' ELSE 'SALE' END AS varchar) AS DOCTYPE, h.ShopIndex AS EXTERNALOBJCHECKID, h.Ck_Number AS NUMBER, (round(h.Summa, 2)) AS DOCSUMM FROM ChequeHead AS h WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE h.Cash_Code <> '' and convert(date, h.DateOperation) = ? and h.shopindex = ? and ? is not null and h.StatusFiscal <> 0 and h.Status <> 0 order by DOCIDCASH

sql_detail_check.value: SELECT P.ChequeId AS DOCIDCASH, cast(CAST(CASE WHEN LEFT(P.Code, 1)= '_' THEN REPLACE(P.code, '_', '') ELSE P.code END AS int) AS Varchar) AS WARESCODE, sum(P.Quant) AS AMOUNT, P.Price AS PRICE, sum(round(P.Summa, 2)) AS SUMMA FROM ChequePos AS P WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE P.ChequeId = ? group by P.ChequeId, P.Code,P.Price
